Generate Level Name Based on Strategy

Source: R/analytical_functions.R
generate_level_name.Rd

Internal helper function to generate meaningful level names for segments.

generate_level_name(
  node_names,
  membership_id,
  naming_strategy,
  custom_names,
  separator,
  max_concat_length,
  pattern_rules
)

Arguments

node_names

Character vector of node names in the segment

membership_id

Character string of the membership ID (e.g., "2.1")

naming_strategy

Character string specifying naming approach

custom_names

Named list of custom names

separator

Character string for concatenation

max_concat_length

Maximum nodes to concatenate

pattern_rules

Named list of pattern replacement rules

Value

Character string with the generated level name

Contents

Developed by Giampaolo Montaletti, Jonas Touboel.
